objects = ['green_target', 'block']
# Query: cover the green target with the block by pushing the block in its direction.
composer("move to the side of the block with its back to the green_target.")
composer("push to green_target")
# done

objects = ['green_target', 'block']
# Query: slide the block onto the green square.
composer("move to the side of the block with its back to the green_target.")
composer("push to green_target")
# done
